cards.name: Approach of the Second Sun
cards.text: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

cards.name: Day of Judgment
cards.text: Destroy all creatures.
cards.flavor:
"This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog."
-Director Taiva, to Isabough

cards.name: Defiant Strike
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn."
-Heroics: A Book of Fables

cards.name: Divine Gambit
cards.text: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Evil is to be unshackled, not slain. Unlock your foe and release the miracle within."
-Keevan, docent of Kollema Hall

cards.name: Ephemerate
cards.text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Gift of Estates
cards.text: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"We asked for a home and received the world."
-Scroll of Nine Blessings

cards.name: Gods Willing
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1.

cards.name: Mana Tithe
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
cards.flavor:
"The tyrant's bellow of rage trailed off into a whimper as the last of his fortune escaped his grasp."
-The Dethroner's Grimoire

cards.name: Revitalize
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Knight Kathryn closed her eyes, bracing herself for the end. When she opened them again, she stood triumphant over her foe."
-Thadus the Healer, Memoirs

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor:
"The blademaster turned his fury to his new foes: root rot and cabbage slugs."
-Myths and Miracles, Vol. VII

cards.name: Teferi's Protection
cards.text:
Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
Exile Teferi's Protection.

cards.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"Five suns! Can you even imagine how complicated the orbital calculations must be? What I wouldn't give to tackle an equation like that!"
-Zimone, Quandrix mage-student

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"Infinite ideas flow through the Multiverse, waiting for an open mind."
-The Biblioplex: An Introduction

cards.name: Compulsive Research
cards.text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
cards.flavor:
"Every Planeswalker remembers the first time their mind touched the staggering vastness of the Multiverse."
-Kasmina

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"One need not know the specific details of a spell to suppress its effect. Simply rearrange the rules of the reality within which the spell operates."
-Imbraham, Quandrix dean

cards.name: Memory Lapse
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Where do our forgotten thoughts go? I knew once, but I can't remember."
-Director Taiva, journal entry

cards.name: Mind's Desire
cards.text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor:
"Shatter your opponent's spell with enough force, and you'll shatter their confidence with it."
-Tome of Obstructions, marginalia

cards.name: Opt
cards.text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The wish most often granted is the wish to choose one's own destiny."
-Aethershrine, inscription

cards.name: Strategic Planning
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"I can offer only information, young one. What path you choose is up to you."
-Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios

cards.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Time Warp
cards.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
cards.flavor:
"Chronomancers have a rather different definition of living in the moment."
-The Millennium Tome

cards.name: Whirlwind Denial
cards.text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
cards.flavor:
"If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."
-Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft

cards.name: Agonizing Remorse
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"Guilt is not absolution. Regret is not justice. But it is right that you suffer."
-Extus Narr

cards.name: Crux of Fate
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
cards.flavor:
"One brother fought for the sake of the Multiverse. The other for himself."
-The Elderspell Parable

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
cards.flavor:
"They distrust my methods, but when they want results, whom do you think they seek?"
-Incantations of Lim-Dûl

cards.name: Demonic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"Demons prefer to deal with those who believe themselves too wise to be fooled."
-Scroll case inscription

cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
cards.flavor:
"An angel can shine like the sun, inspire the weak, and even threaten victory over darkness. But in the end it matters not, for it still dies like any other pest."
-Ob Nixilis

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"Magic brought peace to the Vastlands but was soon corrupted."
-The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells

cards.name: Eliminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
cards.flavor:
"It takes so little energy to erase a person. It's almost like the universe doesn't care that they existed at all."
-Extus Narr

cards.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"To dwell within the Blind Eternities is unthinkable. To encounter those who do could shatter the mind."
-Chronicle of the Titans

cards.name: Sign in Blood
cards.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"It's always my brightest students who make the worst decisions."
-Shaile, Silverquill dean

cards.name: Tainted Pact
cards.text: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

cards.name: Tendrils of Agony
cards.text:
Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.name: Village Rites
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"My colleagues revile the barbarity of the Blood Age, but I believe we have much to learn from the magics of endless war."
-Embrose, Silverquill dean

cards.name: Chaos Warp
cards.text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Be careful when handling old magical trinkets. You never know who they've been."
-Augusta, Lorehold dean

cards.name: Claim the Firstborn
cards.text: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Will! They have a copy of Tales of the Fae here! Want me to read you a bedtime story?"
-Rowan Kenrith

cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor:
"How did you get your hands on that? Wait, never mind. I don't want to know."
-Plargg, Lorehold dean

cards.name: Grapeshot
cards.text:
Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.name: Increasing Vengeance
cards.text:
Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Infuriate
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Some mages duel using intricate spellcraft and superior tactics. Others just get really, really mad."
-Secrets of the Feradorn Sorcerers

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"The first mages witnessed the fury of the raging storm and wished to answer back."
-The Stormwright Texts

cards.name: Mizzix's Mastery
cards.text:
Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.
Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Shock
cards.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"To this day, I have no idea if the heavens were obeying him or attacking him."
-Ral Zarek, research notes

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"Thus, Bruk the Skyhammer earned his epithet and won the war, all in one fiery moment."
-Compendium of Warspells

cards.name: Thrill of Possibility
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"If the prospect of what could be doesn't electrify you to your core, why attend Strixhaven at all?"
-Nassari, Prismari dean

cards.name: Urza's Rage
cards.text:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
This spell can't be countered.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.name: Abundant Harvest
cards.text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Adventurous Impulse
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"Her quest began as all quests do, with one small step in an unexpected direction."
-The Explorer's Testament

cards.name: Channel
cards.text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
cards.flavor:
"As long as you are breathing, you always have something more to give."
-Valentin, Witherbloom dean

cards.name: Cultivate
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"You'd be amazed how much a single plant has to teach you."
-Lisette, Witherbloom dean

cards.name: Harmonize
cards.text: Draw three cards.
cards.flavor:
"The bloody din of invasion faded
And silent song rang through the woods again."
-"Song of Freyalise"

cards.name: Krosan Grip
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"On a world where time was torn asunder, destruction ruled the minds of all."
-Multiversal Metahistories

cards.name: Natural Order
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"Nature is neither cruel nor kind. It operates on necessity, not sentiment."
-Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

cards.name: Primal Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
• Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Regrowth
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"Centuries of war had broken Arcavios, but a single seed began the long process of renewal."
-The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells

cards.name: Snakeskin Veil
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Never reject the kindness of a serpent. It will not be offered twice."
-Druidic manuscript fragment

cards.name: Weather the Storm
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
cards.flavor:
"Neither blade nor tempest can assail the serenity of a tranquil mind."
-The Turrau Carvings

cards.name: Despark
cards.text: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.
cards.flavor:
"A tale of a tyrant being humiliated and losing all his power? I'm inspired already!"
-Killian, Silverquill mage-student

cards.name: Electrolyze
cards.text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The hydraulic power grip was a failure, but the gauntlets were a shocking success."
-Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

cards.name: Growth Spiral
cards.text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"I've gleaned greater insight from the spiraling of a single fern than I have from all the books I've ever read."
-Kianne, Quandrix dean

cards.name: Lightning Helix
cards.text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"Mages in the Blood Age would call down actual thunderstorms on their enemies. I bet we can replicate their technique."
-Dradiel, Lorehold mage-student

cards.name: Putrefy
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"From monarch to mulch as quick as could be."
-The Dethroner's Grimoire

cards.name: Approach of the Second Sun
cards.text: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

cards.name: Day of Judgment
cards.text: Destroy all creatures.

cards.name: Defiant Strike
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Divine Gambit
cards.text: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Ephemerate
cards.text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Gift of Estates
cards.text: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
「家を願い世界を受け取った。」
--九つの祝福の巻物

cards.name: Gods Willing
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Scry 1.

cards.name: Mana Tithe
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
cards.flavor:
「暴君の怒鳴り声は、最後の財宝がその手を逃げ出すと、次第に泣き言になりました。」
--退位させる者のグリモワール

cards.name: Revitalize
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
「騎士カスリンは目を閉じ、最期を覚悟すました。再びめを開けると、勝利を勝ちっていたのです。」
--癒し手のタダス、回顧録

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: 「刃使いは新たな敵へと怒りを向けた。根腐りとキャベジのナメクジだ。」 ー神話と奇跡、第七巻

cards.name: Teferi's Protection
cards.text:
Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
Exile Teferi's Protection.

cards.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
「五つの太陽よ！軌道計算がどんなに複雑か想像できる？そんな方程式に挑戦できるというなら、何だって差し出すわ！」
--クアンドリクスの魔導生徒、ジモーン

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
「無限の考えが多元宇宙を流れ、開からた心を待っている。」
--ビブリオプレックス：序論

cards.name: Compulsive Research
cards.text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
cards.flavor:
「プレインズウォーカーは皆、多元宇宙の驚異的な広大さに初めて精神が触れたときのことを覚えているわ。」
--カズミな

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
「効果を抑えるために、呪文の詳細を知る必要ありません。呪文が操作する現実の規則を再配置するだけでいいのです。」
--クアンドルクスの学部長、イムブラハム

cards.name: Memory Lapse
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
cards.flavor:
「我々が忘れてしまった考えはどこへ行ってすまったのだ？かつて知っていたことが思い出せない。」
--タイヴァ校長の日記

cards.name: Mind's Desire
cards.text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor:
「十分な力で対戦相手の呪文を打ち砕けば、それで自信も打ち砕けるでしょう。」
--障害の秘本、傍注

cards.name: Opt
cards.text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: 「最もよく叶う願いは、自らの運命を選択したいという願いだ。」

cards.name: Strategic Planning
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
「私が与えられるのは情報だけよ。どの道を選ぶかはあなたの自由。」
--アルケヴィオスの神託者、ジャジ

cards.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Time Warp
cards.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
cards.flavor:
「時間術士は、刹那に生きるということに関して特殊な定義を持っています。」
--千年秘本

cards.name: Whirlwind Denial
cards.text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
cards.flavor:
「彼らがあなたの宮殿を荒らそうとするなら、あなたが嵐にならなければなりません。」
--帝国魔術の手引き

cards.name: Agonizing Remorse
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
cards.flavor:
「罪悪感は赦しではない。後悔は正義ではない。だたし、苦しむことは正しい。」
--エクスタス・ナー

cards.name: Crux of Fate
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
cards.flavor:
「兄弟の一人は多元宇宙のために戦った。もう一人は自分のために。」
――古呪の寓話

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
cards.flavor:
「奴らは私の方法を信用していない。しかし成果が必要なとき、奴らが探すの誰だと思う？」
--リム＝トゥールの決まり文句

cards.name: Demonic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: 「悪魔は、自分が賢く、騙されることなどないと信じている者を好む。」 ー巻物入れに刻まれた言葉

cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
cards.flavor:
「天使は太陽のように輝き、弱者を鼓舞し、暗闇を脅かし勝利を手にすることできる。しかし、結局そんなことは重要ではない。それでも最後は他の害虫と同じように死ぬのだから。」
--オブ・ニクシリス

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
「魔法は大界に平和をもたらしたが、すぐに腐敗した。」
--神秘の時代：呪文物語

cards.name: Eliminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
cards.flavor:
「人を消すのにほとんどエネルギーはいらない。稀で宇宙がその存在を全く気にしてないかのようにな。」
--エクスタス・ナー

cards.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
「久遠の闇の中に住むなど考えられない。精神を打ち砕く奴らに遭遇するなど。」
--タイタン年代記

cards.name: Sign in Blood
cards.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
cards.flavor:
「最悪の決断をするのは、いつも最も優秀な生徒です。」
--シルバークイル学部長、シェイル

cards.name: Tainted Pact
cards.text: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

cards.name: Tendrils of Agony
cards.text:
Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.name: Village Rites
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
「同僚たちは血の時代の野蛮さを避難しているが、俺は無限に続く戦争の魔法から学べることは多いと思っている。」
--シルバークイルの学部長、エムブローズ

cards.name: Chaos Warp
cards.text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
「古い魔法の小物を扱うときは注意してください。それが以前に何者だったか分かりませんから。」
--ロアホールドの学部長、オーガスタ

cards.name: Claim the Firstborn
cards.text: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
「ヴィル！フェイの物語があるわ！寝る前に読み聞かせてあげましょうか？」
--ローアン・ケンリス

cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor:

cards.name: Grapeshot

Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.text:
Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Infuriate

cards.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Mizzix's Mastery
cards.text:
Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.

cards.name: Urza's Rage
cards.text:
Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)
This spell can't be countered.
Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.name: Abundant Harvest
cards.text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Adventurous Impulse
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
「彼女の探検は、すべての探検と同様に、予期せぬ方向への小さな一步から始まった。」
--探検者の遺言

cards.name: Channel
cards.text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.
cards.flavor:

cards.name: Cultivate
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
